name: Peace
description: A digital token of tranquility. A reminder to pause, breathe, and find your center.
longDescription: In a world that demands constant motion, Peace offers stillness. This conceptual experience is delivered as a beautifully designed email containing poetic reflections, a guided meditation timer, and visual serenity.
emailSubject: Your Moment of Peace Has Arrived
contentSnippet: In a silent grove, a single leaf floats to the ground. All is calm. In this moment, allow yourself the same gentle descent.

name: Patience
description: A gentle reminder that not everything must happen now. Some things unfold in their own time.
longDescription: Patience is not passive waiting—it's active trust in the process. This experience includes philosophical reflections and a breathing exercise designed to recalibrate your relationship with time.
contentSnippet: The oak tree does not rush its growth. It knows that strength comes from steady, patient becoming.

name: Luck
description: Not a charm, but a lens. A psychological reframe to help you notice the good already present.
longDescription: Luck is often just recognition. This conceptual product offers a cognitive exercise to help you perceive opportunity, connection, and possibility in everyday moments.
contentSnippet: A door opens only for those who notice it. Today, choose to see the doors.

interactiveElement.description: Write down three small fortunes from today

name: Creativity
description: A spark. A provocation. An invitation to see the world with fresh eyes and make something new.
longDescription: Creativity isn't found—it's cultivated. This experience includes artistic prompts, philosophical questions, and a creative exercise designed to break through mental blocks.
contentSnippet: Every masterpiece begins with permission to play. Today, you have that permission.

name: Courage
description: Not the absence of fear, but the decision to move forward anyway. A reminder of your strength.
longDescription: Courage is a muscle. This conceptual experience offers philosophical reflections on bravery, vulnerability, and the power of showing up even when it's hard.
contentSnippet: The hero and the coward feel the same fear. The difference is in what they do next.

interactiveElement.description: Define one brave action for today
